description: This table holds the history of actions taken after the medication being authorized was reordered.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REORD_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the history of decisions made about continuing with this prior authorization after a reorder of the associated order occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Prescription Reordered


Continue with Prior Authorization Request


Cancel Prior Authorization Request


Send a New Request

columns.name: REORD_ACT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the user who made the decision about the reorder status.

columns.name: REORD_ACT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item holds the instant the decision was made about the reorder status.
